name: Sass
description: Automatically compile scss files on save.

configWorkspace.title: Enable compile Sass on Save
configWorkspace.description: Enable compile on save for this project.

configWorkspace.title: CSS Style
configWorkspace.description: Controls the output style of the resulting CSS.

configWorkspace.title: Error CSS
configWorkspace.description: Tells Sass whether to emit a CSS file when an error occurs during compilation.

configWorkspace.title: Generate Source Map
configWorkspace.description: Source maps are files that tell browsers or other tools that consume CSS how that CSS corresponds to the Sass files from which it was generated. They make it possible to see and even edit your Sass files in browsers.

configWorkspace.title: Update Path
configWorkspace.description: Manually set path that an update will be performed on, relative to the workspace directory.

configWorkspace.title: Output Path
configWorkspace.description: Manually set the output path of the generated css files, relative to the workspace directory.

configWorkspace.title: Executable Path
configWorkspace.description: Manually set the path for the sass executable.
